abstract: Op-Ed article by Prof Alan J Kuperman suggests Pres Obama has misrepresented way nuclear deal with Iran will lengthen time it takes for country to make nuclear bomb should it choose to withdraw from agreement; posits that under deal Iran would require three months to make bomb, rather than one year as Obama has stated; calls on Congress to refuse to lift sanctions on Iran, blocking deal.
lead_paragraph: It won’t actually buy us more time if Tehran decides to build a bomb.
snippet: It won’t actually buy us more time if Tehran decides to build a bomb.

keywords.value: Arms Control and Limitation and Disarmament
keywords.name: subject
